description: This file defines mock data handlers for animal behavior analytics, including data transformations and simulated API responses based on imported JSON data.

methods.name: function normalizeBehaviorType(t: string): string { normalizeBehaviorType
methods.description: Normalizes behavior type strings into a canonical taxonomy, mapping known types or defaulting to 'Other'.

methods.name: getSelectedAnimal
methods.description: Returns enriched mock data for a selected animal, adding profile-related fields.

methods.name: getBehaviorCounts
methods.description: Counts behaviors by type, returning an array of type-count objects.

methods.name: getDurationBreakdown
methods.description: Calculates total duration per behavior type.

methods.name: getDailyHeatmap
methods.description: Generates a heatmap array indicating activity counts per hour of day.

methods.name: getBehaviorTypes
methods.description: Returns the unique set of behavior types present.

methods.name: getBehaviors
methods.description: Returns the list of behaviors after normalization.

ctags.name: behaviors
ctags.pattern: /^const behaviors = (behaviorsRaw as any[]).map((b: any) => ({ ...b, type: normalizeBehaviorType(b/
